ComicInfo.Summary:
A bedtime tale of terror is told as a young girl thinks a monster lives in her room... What if the monster just wants to be friends?
But what if it wants something else?
Do not miss A Monster Under the Bed - The newest Grimm Tale of Terror by the company that does horror best!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Giuseppe Cafaro, Simone Di Meo & Ylenia Dinapoli | Missing | B | Cover B | Richard Ortiz & Ylenia Dinapoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Eric J & Stephen Schaffer | 3 |
